attributes.action: Take legal steps to ensure that it is NOT the taxpayer who picks up the tab for David Miranda's illegal detention.
attributes.additional_details: This is QUITE CLEARLY government sponsored criminal activity and it is those in government who made the decision to illegally detain this foreign individual who should pick up the tab.  To allow the taxpayer to pick up the potentially HUGE compensation tab will do nothing but further empower those out of control criminals in our government to commit more and even worse criminal acts.  THEY MUST BE STOPPED.  David Cameron hates it but this country is STILL a democracy and he needs to be removed, and removed soon.
